category: Point at which water must be returned
description: The Licence Holder shall return water <<discharge volume, the water OR all>> abstracted in pursuance of this licence within the area marked <<boundary ref>> on the map <<reference>> situated within the boundary formed by straight lines running between the following National Grid References: <<discharge NGR 1>>, <<discharge NGR 2>>, <<discharge NGR 3>> and <<discharge NGR 4>>.
